title: Contract
description: Smart contract metadata profile following Enscribe smart contract metadata format.

class.description: High-level identifier of this node type

description.description: Short description of the contract purpose (ENSIP-18 description)

avatar.description: Avatar URI for the contract profile (ENSIP-12 avatar)

category.description: Contract category (e.g., defi, gaming, dao, utility, proxy, factory)

license.description: Official software license identifier for the source code

docs.description: Primary documentation URL for developers and users

compiled-metadata.description: A URI to a contract metadata file as generated by a Solidity or Vyper compiler

audits.description: JSON array of third-party audit reports
